events.message: We received the application from Alex Johnson for the Software Engineer position submitted via our careers page.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under Engineering as a Software Developer role focusing on backend systems.
Recruiter Emily Clarke has been assigned to manage Alex Johnson's hiring process for the software engineering role.
Conducted a phone screening with Alex to discuss relevant software development experience and confirm technical skills.
Alex responded positively to the initial screening and expressed strong interest in proceeding to the technical interview stage.
Scheduled the technical interview for Alex with the engineering team on May 7th to focus on backend development and system design.
